Title: Rallying Nature's Allies
Description:
We cannot give into despair now. We must push forward. We must think of another way through the barrier.

First, we need our allies. Countless elementals summoned by Rymek are pouring through the portal. We will need an army that can move in the Dream like we can, or one that can be brought in easily.

Rally the druids and centaur in Shady Sanctuary. It is time to call upon their oaths to preserve the grove.
ObjectivesText: Muster the druids and gather the empowered anchors in Shady Sanctuary.

Objectives.Text: Speak to Aronus For a Lift to Shady Sanctuary
